1.content:
A blue-furred female cat named Rakita sat in a chair with an unhappy glare. She simply muttered, "It ain't easy being me."

A pair of mechanical arms grabbed her and held her up by her tail. It carried her over to a pair of chutes each with different types of fetishes written on them. The tabby sweat-dropped as she realized what was about to happen.

She was about to become a writer's plaything.
1.title: Opening scence

choices: A sleeping human in a nearby bed
The sound of her wetting her diaper
11.content:
The arms released her from their grip, dropping her into the depths of the chute. The feline didn't know where she would end up, but she assumed it was probably some nursery that was specially made for a cat or something.
Her fall was momentarily broken by a net, the recoil of the landing bouncing her up into the hold of another pair of mechanical arms. With Rakita firmly grasped in their hands, two more arms emerged from the wall. One held a bottle of baby powder, the other, a diaper. Despite her best efforts to resist, the arms easily got set up, as they powdered between her hind-legs and taped up the diaper, pulling her tail, which was puffed in displeasure, through a hole in the back. After a gentle pat to the rear, she began her decent once more.

Soon after, she landed upon a pillow, likely there in case landing on her feet didn't work. The room she landed in was unfamiliar to her, which came of no surprise. She tried to explore her surroundings but quickly found issues. Her diaper was quite bulky, spreading her hind-legs considerably. This made walking rather annoying, and since her anatomy allowed no alternative, she would just have to manage. Rakita wandered about, faintly crinkling with every step, when she found [or heard, depending on the option] something.
11.title: Overgrown Kitten

choices: wakes him up 2.0 (this version is diffrent than the fhirst one lol)

she goes next to the human shaking him a bit he then wakes up

writers note:lol that guy that left trough the portal was "me" 4th wall breaking is fun xd

113.content:
...it was some kind of gem the gem was red..and quite bizarre she looked at the gem she was a bit curious what it was so she took it then the gem started glowing and making her grow at fhirst she didnt relise while ever the longer she held it the bigger she got after some time examening the gem she relised she grew she was shocked and threw the gem away the gem broke she was as big as the hall after that she then saw another gem...it was blue....
(what happens after that?)

she trys to find a way to get back to normal size again
114.content:
(ps this gem reacts diffrent than the red one it instantly shrinks you) she found some kind of blue gem it was in some sort of box she looked at the mysterious blue gem but wasnt too interested at fhirst she looked around..there wasnt many things around tho soo she looked back at the blue gem..then curiosity got the best of her she took the gem as soon as she picked it up it shined wery brightly and then for a sec evrything went black she fainted and shrunk when she woke up she was shrunken she looked around a bit confused at what just happend...suprisingly she was small enough to fit under the door (lol we take the shrink and throw the slight trough the window)
(so what now?)
114.title: A bizarre blue gem [Slight shrink]

15.content: The four chutes were ignored as it twirled around to the next four.
15.title: Other

info.brief_description: Whatever you desire to do my feline character, Rakita, you can do. Though no killing her.
info.description: As stated before, you can do whatever you want to her, just don't kill her.
